Container.Name: Pelican-Panel
Container.Overview: Pelican is a free, open-source game server management panel built with PHP, React, and Go. Designed with security in mind, Pelican runs all game servers in isolated Docker containers while exposing a beautiful and intuitive UI to end users.
Container.Requires:
Pelican Wings
After your first run, visit the panel with /installer to complete the install and setup the administrator
Depending on if youre running this behind a reverse proxy, there might be additional steps to be taken. Below is a **Caddy Workaround** mapping which is only needed if you do use a reverse proxy. This would be the Caddyfile for this usecase https://github.com/Mainfrezzer/UnRaid-Templates/blob/main/additions/pelican-panel/etc/caddy/Caddyfile

Config.Name: WebHttp
Config.Description: Http port for the web server

Config.Name: WebHttps
Config.Description: Https port for the web server

Config.Name: Pelican-Logs
Config.Description: All the logs of pelican panel.

Config.Description: This is only required if you run this behind a reverse proxy. If you dont, delete this mapping
